summary: This is a visitor authorization record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, verifying that an attorney from Massachusetts is permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein on July 7, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center who is authorized to receive a visit from an attorney.

events.title: Attorney Visit Authorization for Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: An attorney from Massachusetts is verified and permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a visitor authorization record from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
It verifies that an attorney from Massachusetts is permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein on July 7, 2019.
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the SDNY records related to the Epstein case.
